Kennel

Logline:

A tormented middled-aged man reluctantly agrees to spend a few days in his sister's country house in order to provide himself with some relief from the mounting confusion of his mental landscape

Kennel

A Greater Honesty

Logline:

An unemployed single father living on a small budget tries to impart his own brand of loose morality onto his eight-year old son, despite suffering himself from an acute lack self-consciousness and discipline.

----------------------------
